means: 用尽( exhaust的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: The ship's crew were now exhausted and utterly demoralized.
sentence.Network_cn: 这艘船上的船员现在都已精疲力竭，彻底丧失了信心。

sentence.Network_en: The five survivors eventually reached safety, ragged, half-starved and exhausted.
sentence.Network_cn: 5位幸存者最终到达安全之地时已经衣衫褴褛、饥肠辘辘、精疲力尽。

sentence.Network_en: At the end of the interview I was dazed and exhausted.
sentence.Network_cn: 面试进行到最后，我感到头昏脑胀，筋疲力尽。

必修3英语单词 - 豆丁网 ... cabin n. 小屋；船舱 exhaust vt. 用尽；耗尽；使精疲力尽 Canadian n. 加拿大人.
4. exhaustionexhauster 排气机exhibit hall 展览厅

entry.tran: 使精疲力竭;使疲惫不堪
entry.def: If something exhausts you, it makes you so tired, either physically or mentally, that you have no energy left.

example.ex: He took to walking long distances in an attempt to physically exhaust himself.
example.tran: 他开始长距离步行，试图耗尽自己的体力。

entry.def: If you exhaust something such as money or food, you use or finish it all.

example.ex: We have exhausted all our material resources...
example.tran: 我们已经耗尽了所有的物资。

example.ex: They said that food supplies were almost exhausted.
example.tran: 他们说供应的食物几乎快要吃完了。

entry.tran: 详尽地讨论;详尽无遗地论述
entry.def: If you have exhausted a subject or topic, you have talked about it so much that there is nothing more to say about it.

example.ex: She and Chantal must have exhausted the subject of babies and clothes.
example.tran: 她和尚塔尔肯定已经充分讨论过宝宝和衣服的问题。

entry.def: The exhaust or the exhaust pipe is the pipe which carries the gas out of the engine of a vehicle.
Exhaust is the gas or steam that is produced when the engine of a vehicle is running.

example.tran: 汽车发动机排放的尾气

example.ex: The city's streets are filthy and choked with exhaust fumes.
example.tran: 那座城市的街道肮脏不堪，弥漫着令人窒息的废气。

means.word_mean: 1. drained of energy or effectiveness; extremely tired; completely exhausted;

sentences.sentence: "the trembling of his played out limbs"

means.word_mean: 2. completely emptied of resources or properties;

sentences.sentence: "impossible to grow tobacco on the exhausted soil"
"the day's events left her completely exhausted--her strength drained"

auth_sentence.content: Once the cycle is exhausted generationally, what follows?
auth_sentence.res_content: Once the cycle is exhausted generationally, what follows?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Once the cycle is exhausted generationally, what follows?

auth_sentence.content: Exhausted, his captaincy did not last long thereafter.
auth_sentence.res_content: Exhausted, his captaincy did not last long thereafter.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Exhausted, his captaincy did not last long thereafter.

auth_sentence.content: The air was soggy; the season was exhausted.
auth_sentence.res_content: The air was soggy; the season was exhausted.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The air was soggy; the season was exhausted.

stems_affixes.word_buile: exhaust耗尽;抽完+ed……的→adj.耗尽的, 疲惫的
exhaust耗尽;抽完+ive……的→adj.彻底的,无遗漏的

Sentence.sentence: Some propose storing the CO2 in coal mines or liquid storage in the ocean, Shell favors storing CO2 in deep geological structures such as saline(盐的) formations and exhausted oil and gas fields that exist throughout the world.
You might expect that the student who had undertaken the most exhausted search would be the most satisfied with their final decision, but it turns out that's not true.

means.word_mean: 筋疲力尽的；精疲力竭的

sentences.en: During the training they really put you through it; I was exhausted!
sentences.cn: 训练可真折腾人,我已经筋疲力尽了！

sentences.en: By lunchtime we were all exhausted so we knocked it on the head.
sentences.cn: 午饭时我们都已经筋疲力尽了, 就停下不干了。

sentences.en: All three men were hot, dirty, and exhausted.
sentences.cn: 三个人都是又热、又脏且精疲力竭。
